nodes.text: Star Wars: Phonics is a set of books that was released on September 1, 2012, and published by Quinlan B.Lee.

Learn how to read with all your favorite Star Wars characters! Perfect for reluctant readers, each book is illustrated with fullcolor images from the blockbuster movies. This incredible boxed set focuses on short and long a,e,i,o,u sounds and includes 10 books and 2 workbooks.
